__e: Forgive me, Father, but I have things to do.
"Forgive me Father for what I'm about to do."
Forgive me, father, but I've really nothing to say.
Please forgive me for not being yours.
Forgive me for not being of any help to you.
Forgive me for not coming in sooner. Things are in such a state.
Please, forgive me, Madam. It's just that you...
Please forgive me, but it's still rather hard to –
Uncle, if by any chance, I haνe uttered something wrong..
Well, forgive me for saying so, but that doesn't sound too different from what we all face every day, the general state of being for every person alive.
Forgive me for saying this... but they sort of got it on all night.
Holy father... forgive me for what I am compelled to do.
forgive me for what I have done to you.
I apologize for what I said earlier, but... but please, Father, do not let that overshadow
So forgive me if I can't go through that again.
So forgive me if I can't get it up to raise somebody else's kid.
Forgive me if I don't come to meet you, but I'm afraid I can't walk.
Well, given what happened this past week, you'll excuse me if I don't entirely trust your good judgement.
If I have done anything wrong forgive me.
Pardon me if I ask, where is our mutual friend at present?
So forgive me if I can't get it up to raise somebody else's kid.
Forgive me if I don't come to meet you, but I'm afraid I can't walk.
Now, I have a short time to prepare, so forgive me if you've been over this before.
Forgive me, but I must ask the most difficult question of my entire 25 years of service.
Forgive me, but I think he likes you even less than he likes me.
Forgive me, but I must know if... if you could... if you could come to...
Pardon me, sir, but I never saw that before.
Pardon me, sir, but aren't you speaking for yourself?
Forgive me, monsieur... but I really don't understand your purpose in coming to see me.
Forgive me, Lord, for all that I have done.
Pardon me, sir, but aren't you speaking for yourself?
Begging your pardon, sir, I... don't like speaking out of turn.
